channel.title: Reseting A Skill?
channel.description:
Hey originally everyone on my server started with 99 slayer so they could attack certain monsters that required the level. But now slayer is working and I don't want everyone to have 99 slayer, is there a way to reduce everyone slayer level to 1 and XP to 0? Worst comes worse I'll just spend a day doing it manually but that will be a big pain.
Thanks for helping, Daniel.

item.title: Reseting A Skill?
item.dc:creator: @xAcid_Tripx xAcid Tripx
item.description:
@xAcid_Tripx wrote:

I did it all manually like 200 times lol.
Talk about boring.

Read full topic

item.title: Reseting A Skill?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Just make is so that if the xp is above a certain point… it drops it to 0… and erase it after a about a week. It will mean slayer will not work for a week, but it will reset everybodies slayer nlevel.

Read full topic
